revised_title: Investigation of the Absorption and Reflection of β-Particles by Sheets of Matter of Different Thicknesses
tldr: The authors investigate the absorption and reflection of β-particles by sheets of matter of varying thicknesses, discovering that rays reflected by thin layers are more easily absorbed than those reflected by thicker ones. The results suggest that the reflected radiation can be roughly divided into two parts: an easily absorbed radiation and a more penetrating one.
